welcome: Welcome {name}. Here are the commands currently available: 🔍 • /search - Search for a player. 🆔 - /id - Shows the statistics of a player with the specified ID 👤 • /me - Shows the statistics of the player set as default 🌐 • /language - Change the language of the bot.
language_description: Change the language of the bot
me_description: Shows the statistics of the player set as default
id_description: Shows the statistics of a player with the specified ID
search_usage: Use the /search command to search for a player. Example: /search nickoehler
player_id_usage: Use the /id command to show the statistics of a player with the specified ID. Example: /id 2316541
length_error: The search query must be between 2 and 32 characters
generic_error: An error occurred: {error} If you want to help development, open a detailed issue on how to reproduce the error you encountered. Before opening a new issue, check that it has not already been reported.
no_ranked_data: This player has not played any ranked games yet
no_team_data: This player has not played any ranked team games yet
no_clan_data: This player is not in a clan anymore
player_me_error: You need to set a player as default to use this command
general_stats: ⚔️ • GENERAL STATS • ⚔️ 🎖 • Clan: {clan} 🆙 • Lv: {level} 🔺 • XP: {xp} ⌚️ • Most used legend: {most_used_legend} ⌛️ • Total Playtime: {total_game_time} 🎮 • Games played: {games} 🥇 • Games won: {wins} 🥉 • Games lost: {loses} ⚖️ • Win percentage: {winperc}% 👊 • Total KOs: {totalko} ⚰️ • Total Deaths: {totaldeath} 💀 • Total suicides: {totalsuicide} 😐 • Team KOs: {totalteamko} 💣 BOMBS 💣 ├─► KOs: {kobomb} ╰─► Damage: {damagebomb} 💥 MINES 💥 ├─► KOs: {komine} ╰─► Damage: {damagemine} ☀️ SPIKEBALLS ☀️ ├─► KOs: {kospikeball} ╰─► Damage: {damagespikeball} 👟 SIDE KICK 👟 ├─► KOs: {kosidekick} ╰─► Damage: {damagesidekick} ❄️ SNOWBALLS ❄️ ├─► KOs: {kosnowball} ╰─► Hits: {hitsnowball}
ranked_stats: 🏆 • RANKED 1v1 • 🏆 🔶 • Current elo: {rating} 🔷 • Elo peak: {peak} 👑 • Tier: {tier} 🎮 • Games played: {games} 🥇 • Games won: {wins} 🥉 • Games lost: {loses} 🌎 • Region: {region} 💎 • Estimated glory: {glory} 👑 • Estimated elo reset: {elo_reset}
ranked_team_stats: 🏆 • RANKED 2v2 • 🏆 👥 • Team: {teamname} 🔶 • Current elo: {rating} 🔷 • Elo peak: {peak} 👑 • Tier: {tier} 🎮 • Games played: {games} 🥇 • Games won: {wins} 🥉 • Games lost: {loses} 🌎 • Region: {region}
clan_stats: 🆔 • Clan ID: {id} 👑 • Clan name: {name} 🔺 • XP: {xp} 👥 • Members: {num} 📅 • Creation date: {date} {current}/{total}
legend_stats: 🥷 • LEGEND • 🥷 🆔 • Legend ID: {id} 🥷 • Legend Name: {name} 🆙 • Level: {level} 🔺 • XP: {xp} ⌚ • Playtime: {matchtime} 🎮 • Matches Played: {games} 🥇 • Matches Won: {wins} 🥉 • Matches Lost: {loses} ⚖️ • Win Percentage: {winperc}% 👊 • Total KOs: {ko} ⚰ • Total Deaths: {death} 💀 • Total Suicides: {suicide} 😐 • Team KOs: {teamko} 🔫 WEAPONS 🔫 ├─► Weapon 1 Time Held: {timeheldweaponone} ├─► Weapon 1 KOs: {koweaponone} ├─► Weapon 1 Damage: {damageweaponone} ├─► Weapon 2 Time Held: {timeheldweapontwo} ├─► Weapon 2 KOs: {koweapontwo} ╰─► Weapon 2 Damage: {damageweapontwo} 👊 UNARMED 👊 ├─► KOs: {kounarmed} ╰─► Damage: {damageunarmed} 📱 GADGETS📱 ├─► KOs: {kogadgets} ╰─► Damage: {damagegadgets} 🎯 THROWN ITEMS 🎯 ├─► KOs: {kothrownitem} ╰─► Damage: {damagethrownitem}
